about.title: About Octopus Union
about.body: Octopus Union is a dynamic and innovative player in the blockchain industry. Since our inception in 2020, we have been dedicated to providing our members with endless earning opportunities through our diverse range of investment strategies and cutting-edge solutions. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, Octopus Union offers something for everyone. Join our community today and unlock the full potential of your investments

price.title: How much does the subscription cost?

purchase.title: How to get in?
purchase.body: Follow the posts on social networks.

contacts.title: How can I contact you?
contacts.body: We are ready to answer all your questions through our Discord.

market.title: Exclusive information
market.body: We are constantly discovering something new, which allows our members to receive the most up-to-date information about unusual ways of earning.

crypto-currency.title: Crypto
crypto-currency.body: From the first day Octopus Cook has been a place where you can learn as much as possible about crypto.

cardano.title: Cardano
cardano.body: Our top priority in research is the Cardano blockchain, a highly secure and innovative platform that offers unparalleled potential for growth and investment opportunities.

nft.title: NFT
nft.body: We have a separate team dealing with the NFT section, which has a huge experience in this sphere and is able to share a qualitative analysis of upcoming releases.

crypto-games.title: CryptoGames
crypto-games.body: We have a separate section with a detailed analysis of Play to Earn games, where we notify about the most profitable and low-key projects.

software.title: Software
software.body: We believe in empowering our members to reach their full potential. We offer special software to mint drops in main networks to all members. Join us for exclusive access and to maximize your ROI.

groupbuys.title: DAO partnerships
groupbuys.body: At Octopus Union, we believe in the power of collaboration. That's why we've formed numerous partnerships with DAOs to enhance our offerings and bring more cutting-edge value to our members.

community.title: Community
community.body: The main advantage of our group is people. Our members can rightfully be called part of one family, where everyone shares their experience with others.
